ygData.subject: Surfing (was Re: Re: Bards always complaining)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I suppose I m going to be the devil s advocate here... but I ve always hated the surfing thing. The reason why is because it is so obviously a bug.
ygData.messageBody:
>> But I don't want to stop surfing, does anyone?

Well, I suppose I'm going to be the devil's advocate here... but I've always
hated the surfing thing.

The reason why is because it is so obviously a bug. Firstly, it isn't a
floating song... there is no reason why we should float. (If you were
levitated then it would be cool...) Secondly, it isn't like you surf all the
time... only when the animation runs. So it is very obvious that they just
forgot or didn't have time to create the running and playing animation.

I like to immerse myself in the game and really get into it... and every
time I see a bard running then start to play and start floating... it just
makes me think this is a buggy, half-finished game.

I can't wait til they fix it! :)

Daleia
